charges.charge_description: KNOWLINGLY AND WILLFULLY MAKE A FALSE STATEMENT IN CONNECTION WITH AN APPLICATION FOR WORKERS' COMPENSATION

charges.charge_offence_description: KNOWLINGLY AND WILLFULLY MAKE A FALSE STATEMENT IN

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment of 12 months and 1 day. The Court recommended that the defendant be incarcerated in a California facility. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be placed on Supervised Release for a Term of 12 months. The defendant shall pay a Special Assessment of $100, payment to begin immediately. The defendant shall also pay Restitution in the amount of $124,236.67, payment to begin immediately. The Court found the defendant did not have the ability to pay a fine, and the imposition of a fine was waived.

charges.charge_description: FALSE STATEMENT TO OBTAIN FEDERAL EMPLOYEE'S COMPENSATION(10-18)
